title: So long, dandelion: Crayola retiring crayon color
text: Spotify, Apple boost music business to best year in two decades March 31, 2017, 2:00 am The growing popularity of Spotify and Apple Music is nursing the music industry back to health after years of declining sales. Northern Front Range is an epicenter of rising home unaffordability March 31, 2017, 12:05 am Nowhere else in the country has home affordability gotten so out of whack than along the northern Front Range, according to a housing report released Thursday. “It’s a different world now,” Dick Monfort says, after Rockies extend Coors Field lease long-term March 30, 2017, 7:18 pm The four-year ordeal to keep baseball at Coors Field for three more decades proved to be a new experience for Rockies owner Dick Monfort. On Wednesday, he agreed to extend his club’s lease at the ballpark through 2047. But not without difficulty. Hey teens: Need a summer job?
